KuroWiki

KuroWiki
KuroWiki homepage
Formerly known as HoriWiki (May-June 2025)
LexWiki (July 2025)
Developer Kit and the KuroWiki Contributors (before September 2025)
Axeon Network (since September 2025)
Written in HTML/CSS/JS, Ruby+Jekyll
Type Online Encyclopedia
Initial release 2.4.3567.main_wik.250504-1045 / 2025-05-04
Current release 6.0.4400.main.251204-0046 / 2025-10-30
Repository Source code on GitHub
Status Available
Link https://axeon-network.github.io/kurowiki

KuroWiki is an open-source online encyclopedia planned to be launched as stable by the Axeon Network on 17 January 2026. Its main purpose is documenting meanings of inside jokes and random things of the Axeon Network. It is primarily developed by Kit and KayAurora.

KuroWiki was planned to be powered by MediaWiki with a custom user interface. However, it was decided instead to build a separate wiki engine, codenamed Deltari,” using Jekyll.

Before an agreement between Kit and KayAurora (members of the Axeon Network), KuroWiki was a Kit-focused encyclopedia (known as HoriWiki and LexWiki), which was the main theme of the wiki until late August 2025.

After the agreement, KuroWiki expanded its content to not only cover Kit stuff, but to also cover the Axeon Network as a whole.

Notable KuroWiki builds

KuroWiki build 3567

Main article: KuroWiki build 3567 (main_wik)

KuroWiki build 3567 (full tag: 2.4.3567.main-wik.250504-1045) is the first build of KuroWiki to ever exist. This build is a fork of HoriWebsite v2.4 build 3567.
This fork came to existance due to a issue with Jekyll’s page generation system not working when Kit used the jekyll new command.

This build was compiled on 4 May 2025 at 10:45 UTC-6.
Two compiles of this build exist, being 7 minutes apart.
